attributes.action: Do not end the Summer University in deprived boroughs.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Department of Education to keep the very successful Summer University in socially deprived areas.

Recently the Summer University program was stopped in Islington, organisations like these are a great source of qualification for the youth to use to get better jobs and should not be stopped under any circumstances.

We want to Department of Education to reconsider keeping these programs and others that relate in the few boroughs that already have it.
